short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promptly: Grammarly for your ChatGPT prompts, faster results in a fraction of the time. Try it out on ChatGPT!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool enables you to improve your search results when entering a query for ChatGPT and other language models that you chat with. Instead of going back and forth with the AI to refine a response, receive detailed autocomplete suggestions to improve your initial prompt. This works like Google search and you also see a prompt's popularity and rating out of 5.

Our search engine is crowdsourced, meaning you benefit from a rich knowledge base that improves its quality as you use it more. After selecting a prompt, choose to give a rating and feedback based on how well the LLM's response serves your needs.

Make Promptly your default tool for talking to language AI. One prompt is all you need!
